DOC.brief_summary: This study design investigate effect epidural anesthesia combine general anesthesia laparoscopic surgery . The investigator hypothesize epidural anesthesia effectively block activation sympathetic nervous system surgery , thus activate nitric oxide reduce splanchnic ischemia decrease postoperative renal function .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Epidural Anesthesia Bioavailability Nitric Oxide Renal Function Patients Undergoing Laparoscopic Surgery
DOC.criteria: ASA class 1 2 adult patient schedule endoscopic prostatectomy Patient refusal Patients diuretic Patients renal failure ( eGFR < 60 ml/min/1.73 m2 )
